body:
$smallYear = date('d-m-y H:i:s',strtotime('2017'));

Doing this will always give your current year because you're passing only Hours and minutes to strtotime method. So you're getting 16 as output instead of 17. Result of this is 29-10-16 20:17:00

$smallYear = date('y',strtotime('+1 year'));

This will give you 17 instead or 16, because current year is 16 you're adding + 1 to year so result is 17. Using this you can build your logic.
title: PHP get small year from 2015?
